reviewText: I received this movie in my mail today; as soon as I put it in my DVD player it said 'disk error'. I am returning it right away. I want my money back.

A courtroom drama based on a true story which exposes the horrors of racial violence. On a cold night in 1986, 3 black men struggled to repair their car in a middle-class neighbourhood of New York City.

Unable to start the vehicle, they sought refuge in a small restaurant nearby. What happened next sent shockwaves throughout the world. ...Making a Case for Murder
